016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks;
017
018import static de.cuioss.tools.string.MoreStrings.isEmpty;
019
020import java.io.IOException;
021import java.util.Map.Entry;
022
023import javax.faces.component.EditableValueHolder;
024import javax.faces.component.UIComponent;
025import javax.faces.component.UIInput;
026import javax.faces.component.UIOutcomeTarget;
027import javax.faces.component.UIOutput;
028import javax.faces.component.html.HtmlInputText;
029import javax.faces.component.html.HtmlOutcomeTargetLink;
030import javax.faces.component.html.HtmlOutputLink;
031import javax.faces.context.FacesContext;
032import javax.faces.render.Renderer;
033
034import de.cuioss.tools.property.PropertyHolder;
035import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
036
037/**
038 * Simple Mock renderer that is capable of rendering any element by using the
039 * simple-name of the given component. In addition it is capable of rendering
040 * the 'id'-attribute as 'id' and 'name' in case the component is of type
041 * {@link UIInput} or the attribute {@link UIComponent#getId()} is set, the
042 * 'styleClass' and 'style' attributes and reacts to the 'rendered'-attribute.
043 * It can be configured to use a certain tagname to be rendered by using
044 * {@link #CuiMockRenderer(String)}. Otherwise the simple-name of the component
045 * will be used.
046 *
047 * @author Oliver Wolff
048 */
049@RequiredArgsConstructor
050public class CuiMockRenderer extends Renderer {
051
052    private static final String OUTCOME = "outcome";
053    private static final String TARGET = "target";
054    private static final String VALUE = "value";
055    private static final String STYLE_CLASS = "styleClass";
056    private static final String STYLE_ATTRIBUTE = "style";
057    private static final String TITLE = "title";
058    private static final String DISABLED = "disabled";
059
060    private final String tagName;
061
062    /**
063     * Default constructor resulting in the actual component to be used as tagname.
064     */
065    public CuiMockRenderer() {
066        this(null);
067    }
068
069    @Override
070    public void encodeBegin(final FacesContext context, final UIComponent component) throws IOException {
071        if (component.isRendered()) {
072            context.getResponseWriter().startElement(getTagName(component), component);
073            writeIdAndName(context, component);
074
075            handleInputText(context, component);
076
077            writeBasicAttributes(context, component);
078
079            if (component instanceof EditableValueHolder valueHolder) {
080                context.getResponseWriter().writeAttribute(VALUE, valueHolder.getValue(), VALUE);
081            } else if (component instanceof UIOutcomeTarget) {
082                handleOutputTarget(context, component);
083            } else if (component instanceof HtmlOutputLink) {
084                handleHtmlOutputLink(context, component);
085            } else if (component instanceof UIOutput) {
086                handleUIOutput(context, component);
087            }
088
089            handleOutcomeTargetLink(context, component);
090        }
091    }
092
093    private void handleOutcomeTargetLink(final FacesContext context, final UIComponent component) throws IOException {
094        if (component instanceof HtmlOutcomeTargetLink output && null != output.getTarget()) {
095            context.getResponseWriter().writeAttribute(TARGET, output.getTarget(), TARGET);
096        }
097    }
098
099    private void handleUIOutput(final FacesContext context, final UIComponent component) throws IOException {
100        var output = (UIOutput) component;
101        if (null != output.getValue()) {
102            context.getResponseWriter().writeText(output.getValue(), VALUE);
103        }
104    }
105
106    private void handleHtmlOutputLink(final FacesContext context, final UIComponent component) throws IOException {
107        var output = (HtmlOutputLink) component;
108        if (null != output.getTarget()) {
109            context.getResponseWriter().writeAttribute(TARGET, output.getTarget(), TARGET);
110        }
111        if (null != output.getValue()) {
112            context.getResponseWriter().writeAttribute(VALUE, output.getValue(), VALUE);
113        }
114    }
115
116    private void handleOutputTarget(final FacesContext context, final UIComponent component) throws IOException {
117        var output = (UIOutcomeTarget) component;
118        if (null != output.getOutcome()) {
119            context.getResponseWriter().writeAttribute(OUTCOME, output.getOutcome(), OUTCOME);
120        }
121        if (null != output.getValue()) {
122            context.getResponseWriter().writeAttribute(VALUE, output.getValue(), VALUE);
123        }
124    }
125
126    private void writeBasicAttributes(final FacesContext context, final UIComponent component) throws IOException {
127        writeAttributeIfPresent(context, component, STYLE_CLASS, "class");
128        writeAttributeIfPresent(context, component, STYLE_ATTRIBUTE, STYLE_ATTRIBUTE);
129        writeAttributeIfPresent(context, component, TITLE, TITLE);
130
131        for (Entry<String, Object> entry : component.getPassThroughAttributes(true).entrySet()) {
132            context.getResponseWriter().writeAttribute(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue(), null);
133        }
134    }
135
136    private void handleInputText(final FacesContext context, final UIComponent component) throws IOException {
137        if (component instanceof HtmlInputText text) {
138            context.getResponseWriter().writeAttribute("type", "text", null);
139            if (text.isDisabled()) {
140                context.getResponseWriter().writeAttribute(DISABLED, DISABLED, null);
141            }
142        }
143    }
144
145    private void writeIdAndName(final FacesContext context, final UIComponent component) throws IOException {
146        if (!isEmpty(component.getId()) || component instanceof UIInput) {
147            var id = component.getClientId();
148            context.getResponseWriter().writeAttribute("id", id, null);
149            context.getResponseWriter().writeAttribute("name", id, null);
150        }
151    }
152
153    private static void writeAttributeIfPresent(final FacesContext context, final UIComponent component,
154            final String propertyName, final String attributeName) throws IOException {
155        var holder = PropertyHolder.from(component.getClass(), propertyName);
156        if (holder.isPresent() && holder.get().getReadWrite().isReadable()) {
157            var propertyValue = holder.get().readFrom(component);
158            if (null != propertyValue) {
159                context.getResponseWriter().writeAttribute(attributeName, propertyValue, null);
160            }
161        }
162    }
163
164    @Override
165    public void encodeEnd(final FacesContext context, final UIComponent component) throws IOException {
166        if (component.isRendered()) {
167            context.getResponseWriter().endElement(getTagName(component));
168        }
169    }
170
171    private String getTagName(final UIComponent component) {
172        if (!isEmpty(tagName)) {
173            return tagName;
174        }
175        return component.getClass().getSimpleName();
176    }
177}
